uint8_t drive ( uint8_t  speed  ) 

moves the nibo forwards if no obstacle blocks the path

Parameters:
speed the speed the nibo moves in ticks
Returns:
drive_front_free(1) or drive_direction_blocked(0) if the path is blocked
